name: Istarian Drone
languages: understands the languages spoken by its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The drone can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The drone doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The drone makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) lightning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15). The drone has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

actions.name: Crystalline Spit {@recharge 5}
entries: The drone spits crackling gel in a line 5 feet wide and 20 feet long. Each creature in the line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 (4d6 damage) lightning damage and is {@condition restrained} by the gel, which hardens into crystal. The creature is {@condition restrained} until the crystal is destroyed. The crystal has AC 15, 15 hit points, immunity to poison and psychic damage, and vulnerability to thunder damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained}.
